translations.home.noMicro: No microtransactions or any other hidden costs.
translations.home.compMatchesBlurb: Participate with your club, national team or mix team in leagues and cups organized by the community.
translations.home.playerCustomisationBlurb: Set your shirt name, pick your shirt number and choose your ethnicity, hair style, shoes, keeper gloves, ball, and sleeve length.
translations.home.unparalleledFreedomBlurb: The combination of a third-person camera together with mouse and keyboard input gives you full control over your dribbling, shooting, and passing.
translations.home.teamSizesBlurb: Whether you prefer 4v4 street games or our standard 8v8 matchups, we support everything from 1 to 11 players per side.
translations.home.celebrationsBlurb: Choreograph your team's goal celebrations with various animations.
translations.home.customAssetsBlurb: Make your own maps, team kits, balls, shoes, and keeper gloves.
translations.home.skillMovesBlurb: Show your mastery of the game with bicycle kicks, diving headers, ball flicks, and precision dribbling.
translations.matchOverview.resultPending: This match result is still pending. Check back soon for the final result!
translations.globals.name: Name
translations.errorPage.leadTitle: Oh dear. What a bad miss.
translations.errorPage.subTitle: It's all gone horribly wrong. An error occured, or something
translations.errorPage.actionToTake: If the issue continues to persist, please contact an administrator via our Discord guild, or using the contact form below.
translations.recentMatches.noMatchesYet: No matches played yet. Come back soon!
translations.recentMatches.noMatchesFoundCriteria: No matches found meeting the given criteria. Sorry!
translations.playerStatistics.noDataAvailable: No player data available yet. Come back later! Please.
translations.profileEditor.disableDMNotificationsBlur: Enabling this will mean Coach doesn't DM you on Discord with any match notifications
translations.matchEditor.matchDataWasUploadedOn: Match data for this match was uploaded on {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.matchEditor.matchDataProcessing: The statistics for this match are currently being uploaded. Please do not attempt to re-upload this data.
translations.matchEditor.editingHomeAwayBlurb: Editing home & away teams does not currently change the underlying statistics
translations.matchEditor.matchResultOverrideBlurb: This will override any submitted result, as well as acting as a substitute for where match data is not available
translations.fixtures.noUpcomingFixtures: There are currently no upcoming matches scheduled
translations.tournaments.noCurrentTournaments: There are no tournaments currently taking place. Check back again soon!
translations.about.blurb: IOSoccer is a free non-commercial competitive third-person online multiplayer soccer game that offers unparalleled freedom in ball control and gameplay depth. Originally released in 2003 under the full name International Online Soccer as a Half-Life mod, the game was later ported to the Source Engine and re-released in 2008, and over the course of the next decade was further developed by a new development team consisting of existing community members.
translations.about.features.freedom: Unparalleled freedom in ball control and gameplay depth: The combination of a third-person camera together with mouse and keyboard input gives you full control over your dribbling, shooting, and passing.
translations.about.features.skilMoves: Skill moves: Show your mastery of the game with bicycle kicks, diving headers, ball flicks, and precision dribbling.
translations.about.features.teamSizes: Flexible team sizes: Whether you prefer 4v4 street games or our standard 8v8 matchups, we support everything from 1 to 11 players per side.
translations.about.features.keepers: AI and human goalkeepers: You can let the server control the keeper or take its position yourself on the fly.
translations.about.features.publicMatches: Public matches: Join and leave public servers with casual matches whenever you want to.
translations.about.features.compMatches: Competitive matches: Participate with your club, national team or mix team in leagues and cups organized by the community.
translations.about.features.dedicatedServers: Dedicated servers: Use our official dedicated servers or rent your own one from a hoster of your choice.
translations.about.features.playerCustomisation: Player customization: Set your shirt name, pick your shirt number and choose your ethnicity, hair style, shoes, keeper gloves, ball, and sleeve length.
translations.about.features.replays: Instant replays and highlights: Watch goals again from the TV camera's perspective right after they happened and use intermissions to catch up on chances you missed.
translations.about.features.celebrations: Goal celebrations: Choreograph your team's goal celebrations with various animations.
translations.about.features.customAssets: Custom assets: Make your own maps, team kits, balls, shoes, and keeper gloves.
translations.about.features.free: 100% free: No microtransactions or any other hidden costs.
translations.teams.noTeamsCreated: No teams have been created yet of this type in this region
translations.globals.noTeamsDiedYet: No teams have died yet. Great!
translations.teamEditor.youAreNotMember: You are not currently a member of any teams. Teams can invite you to join, or you can form a new team.
translations.imageUploader.invalidImage: Invalid image. The image must not exceed 250KB and be of type PNG.
translations.imageUploader.imageUploaded: Image successfully uploaded. Changes will not take affect until you press Save.
translations.tournaments.noTournaments: No tournaments have taken place yet. Check back again soon!
translations.botManual.introduction: CoachBot is the community's matchmaking Discord Bot, which enables easy matchmaking between teams, in multiple regions across the world. To use CoachBot for your team, create a team via the Hub, and navigate to the "Discord" tab of the team editor.
translations.botManual.signBlurb: Sign to the current lineup in a particular position
translations.botManual.countersignBlurb: Sign another player to the current lineup in a particular position
translations.botManual.unsignBlurb: Unsign yourself from the current lineup
translations.botManual.counterUnsignBlurb: Unsign another player from the current lineup
translations.botManual.joinSubsBenchBlurb: Joins a lineups sub bench, where you will be automatically inserted into the current lineup if someone unsigns
translations.botManual.leaveSubsBenchBlurb: Leaves the lineups sub bench, so you will not replace anyone if they unsign
translations.botManual.viewChallengesBlurb: Returns the current teams available to challenge
translations.botManual.challengeTeamBlurb: Challenges the specified team, by their team code
translations.botManual.unchallengeTeamBlurb: Unchallenges the team you are currently challenging, abandoning the match
translations.botManual.searchBlurb: Starts an opposition search, where an advert will be sent to other team channels, and your team will appear on the challenges list.
translations.botManual.stopSearchBlurb: Stops the current search, if your team is searching (via {$START_TAG_CODE}!search{$CLOSE_TAG_CODE})
translations.botManual.readyBlurb: When the match is ready (a team is set and lineups are full), this starts the match, sending both teams to the specified server. Server ID's are from the {$START_TAG_CODE}!servers{$CLOSE_TAG_CODE} command
translations.botManual.resetupServerBlurb: If a match has been readied, and the server changes, or just needs to be re-setup, this command will handle it. The match id is available from the previous {$START_TAG_CODE}!ready{$CLOSE_TAG_CODE} message.
translations.botManual.requestSubBlurb: Requests a sub in the current channel for the position specified. Once accepted, the player will be sent the server address to join.
translations.botManual.acceptSubRequestBlurb: Accepts the sub request advertised by someone using the {$START_TAG_CODE}!requestsub{$CLOSE_TAG_CODE} command
translations.botManual.cancelSubRequestBlurb: Cancels the sub request advertised by someone using the {$START_TAG_CODE}!requestsub{$CLOSE_TAG_CODE} command
translations.botManual.highlightChannelBlurb: Tells CoachBot to highlight everyone in the channel via the @here mention, in order to get them to sign up
translations.botManual.recentMatchListBlurb: Returns a list of matches recently played by the current channel
translations.botManual.serverListBlurb: Get the full list of available servers for the current region
translations.botManual.enableSingleKeeperBlurb: Enables single keeper on the specified server
translations.botManual.disableSingleKeeperBlurb: Disables single keeper on the specified server
translations.botManual.viewServerMapsBlurb: Return the map list for the specified server
translations.botManual.viewKitsBlurb: Return the kit list for the specified server
translations.botManual.changeKitsBlurb: Changes the kits to the specified kits on the specified server
translations.botManual.serverInfoBlurb: Returns granular server info for the specified server
translations.layout.iosBlurb: IOSoccer is a unique free non-commercial competitive third-person online multiplayer soccer game.
translations.contact.emailUsBlurb: Feel free to send us any support queries, requests, or enquiries, below.
translations.playerProfile.performanceTracker.notEnou: There is not yet enough historical data for this player
translations.playerProfile.noMatches: Hold tight! This player has not played in matches yet
translations.playerProfile.noMatchesYet: Hold tight! This player has not played in matches yet
translations.playerProfile.playerHasntJoinedTeam: This player hasn't joined a team yet!
translations.playerProfile.noTournaments: This player hasn't played in any tournaments yet. What a shame.
translations.team.squad.noPlayers: This team doesn't have any active players. What a shame.
translations.team.tournaments.noTournaments: This team hasn't taken part in any tournaments yet. Shame.
translations.team.tracker.notEnoughDate: There is not yet enough historical data for this team
translations.teamEditor.accessDenied: You do not have access to manage this team
translations.teamEditor.teamCodeblurb: This must be unique in the region your team plays in. It will be used ingame, and also for matchmaking searches.
translations.teamEditor.tokenBlurb: Please ask your region's community administrator for a team creation token.
translations.teamEditor.teamCodeAlreadyExists: A team already exists with this team code in this region. Please enter a unique team code.
translations.teamEditor.invalidToken: Invalid token provided. Please contact your region's administrator to obtain a new token.
translations.teamEditor.inviteCoachBotServer: To add a channel, you must have {$START_LINK}invited CoachBot to your Discord server{$CLOSE_LINK}, and it must have access to your channel
translations.teamEditor.kitEmoteBlurb: This is only used if you have enabled the team sheet view on a channel, to display an empty position.
translations.teamEditor.linkDiscordAccountProfile: You must link your Discord account to your own profile first, via the {$START_LINK}edit profile screen{$CLOSE_LINK}
translations.teamEditor.channels.disableSearchNotific: Selecting this will stop Coach from sending messages to your channel when teams are looking for an opponent
translations.teamEditor.channels.duplicityProtectionB: Selecting this will enable Coach removing a player from the line-up when they go to play another match in a different channel
translations.teamEditor.channels.useClassicLineupBlur: Shows the team list in Discord in a single line, without kits or formations
translations.teamEditor.subTeamNameBlurb: If this is a secondary channel (i.e. not your team's main channel) then you will want to use populate this with an appropriate name. For example, for the IOSoccer mix "team", Overlap is a subteam.
translations.teamEditor.searchTeamNameBlurb: This is used to identify your team in searches. If this channel is your secondary channel, you will need to add an appropriate suffix (e.g. O for IOSO, if it were IOSoccer's Overlap channel)
translations.teamEditor.subTeamCodePlaceholder: Leave blank if this is your primary channel
translations.teamEditor.channels.isMixChannelBlurb: The default opponent will be a second mix team that players can sign up to
translations.teamEditor.channels.channelTypeBlurb: Public mixes are reserved for official mix channels that can be challenged
translations.teamEditor.channels.inactiveBlurb: Mark a channel as inactive to delete it from your channel list
translations.teamEditor.channels.alreadyChannelSearch: There is already a channel for your team with this search team code and match format
translations.teamEditor.noChannelsAdded: You have not added any channels yet. Click the "Add Channel" button to get started.
translations.playerSelector.noPlayersFoundMatching: No players found matching the name provided
translations.teamEditor.playerAlreadyTeamed: Couldn't add player. Players can only belong to one club team at any one time. For loanees, their parent club must set them to loaned first.
translations.teamEditor.playerAlreadyInSquad: Couldn't add player, as they're already in your squad. If they are showing as pending, you will need them to accept your invite.
translations.scorePredictor.noMatchesToPredict: No matches currently available to predict
translations.scorePredictor.playerNoPredictions: This player hasn't made any predictions yet!
translations.scorePredictor.noTournamentsAvailable: There are no tournaments currently taking place. Check back again soon!
translations.fantasy.rules.pointsLimit: You can spend up to {$INTERPOLATION} points.
translations.fantasy.rules.positionLimit: You must pick: 1 Goalkeeper, 3 Defenders, 1 Midfielder, 3 Attackers, and 3 Flex Players
translations.fantasy.rules.flex: Flex players can be used for any position.
translations.fantasy.rules.teamLimit: You can only select maximum of 3 players from the same team.
translations.fantasy.rules.playerLimit: You have to fill all 11 slots for your squad to be complete.
translations.fantasy.rules.timeLimit: Your team can be changed up until the first game, however it must be complete at kick off to qualify.
translations.fantasy.editingClosed: Editing of fantasy teams for this tournament has closed
translations.fantasy.noFantasyTournaments: There are no fantasy tournament games yet. Come back soon!
translations.fantasy.noPreviousEntries: You haven't entered any fantasy tournaments yet. Once you have, they will appear here.
translations.fantasy.noTournamentsToEnter: There are currently no fantasy tournaments to enter
translations.fantasy.playerLeaderboard.howManyTeams: How many teams the player has been picked for
